title: Akhtam Nazarov
text:
Akhtam Nazarov (; born 29 September 1992) is a <a href="Tajikistan">Tajikistan</a>i <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who currently plays for <a href="FC%20Istiklol">FC Istiklol</a> and the <a href="Tajikistan%20national%20football%20team">Tajikistan national football team</a>.
Career.
Club.
In November 2019, Nazarov signed for <a href="2018%E2%80%9319%20Bangladesh%20Premier%20League%20%28football%29">Bangladesh</a> Champions <a href="Bashundhara%20Kings">Bashundhara Kings</a> on a one-year contract.
On 22 July 2020, Nazarov returned to <a href="FC%20Istiklol">FC Istiklol</a>, signing a contract until the end of the 2021 season.
